compliant.section: Your privacy is of great importance to us.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and fairness in data processing.

compliant.section: Please note that you do not need to provide any personal information to visit the Site.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - consent is not required for visiting the site.

non_compliant.section: However, when Macronix receives information about you, we may use it to fulfill your specific request, to provide a better service, or to improve the Site.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the purposes of data collection and ensure that users are informed about their rights regarding their personal data.
